bwwExcerpt: Of course, this isn't the first time McAnuff and his team tried to recapture that old Jersey magic. (See Summer, last year's ode to disco diva Donna Summer.) But ATP had four chances-out-of-town runs in Berkeley, Calif., Washington, D.C., Los Angeles, and Toronto (curiously, not the Tempts' hometown, Detroit)-to, as Otis says of famous, and famously ego-driven, lead singer David Ruffin (Ephraim Sykes), catch "lightning in a bottle." Sadly, there are few sparks at the Imperial.

keyPhrases.quote: Sadly, there are few sparks at the Imperial.
